translation.en: [narrator] For thousands of years,
Buddha oversaw the universe.
And the Immortal Ones in heaven
and kings in hell
watched over earthly affairs.
Demons walked among us,
and dragons ruled the sea.
translation.it: e i draghi dominavano i mari.

translation.en: Everything was in balance.
We respected the gods, and we followed the rules
translation.it: Rispettavamo gli dei e seguivamo le regole,

translation.en: until the night a magical rock
translation.it: finché una notte, da una roccia magica,

translation.en: gave birth to a powerful being.
[narrator] Meet
trouble.
Okay, okay. Attention, everyone.
translation.it: Ok. Attenzione, prego. Abbiamo cose importanti di cui discutere.

translation.en: We have important business to discuss.
translation.it: Attenzione, prego. Abbiamo cose importanti di cui discutere.

translation.en: I, your Jade Emperor, Architect of the Universe and Lord of the Immortals,
translation.it: Io, Imperatore di Giada, Signore dell'Universo e degli Immortali,

translation.en: shall throw the greatest, most fantastic banquet
translation.it: darò il più grande e fantastico banchetto

translation.en: since the one we did last Tuesday.
Doesn't that sound fun, hmm? Understood, Your Majesty.
translation.it: - Non è uno spasso? - Inteso, Maestà.

translation.en: Now, seating arrangements. Place the Immortal Ones at my head table.
translation.it: Disponiamo gli ospiti. Gli Immortali al tavolo d'onore.

translation.en: Minor gods by the kitchen in the back--
What on Earth?
Hm, an uncontrollable monkey shooting light beams from his eyes?
translation.it: Una scimmia fuori controllo che spara raggi dagli occhi?

translation.en: He's probably just excited, Your Majesty. We can't have that. Get rid of him.
translation.it: - Sarà contenta. - Non al mio banchetto. Eliminatela.

translation.en: -[deep voice] Patience. -[Jade Emperor shrieks]
Buddha! I didn't see you there.
[Buddha] This monkey is a powerful being.
translation.it: Questa scimmia è una creatura potente.

translation.en: He has an important destiny.
Let him find his way.
translation.it: Lascia che trovi la sua strada.

translation.en: Very well.
I mean, what's the worst it can do, right?
Where were we? Ah, dessert!
I'm thinking a ten-foot egg tart sculpture of me.
translation.it: Pensavo a una crostata fatta come me alta tre metri.

translation.en: A wise monkey never stretches beyond his grasp.
translation.it: Una scimmia saggia non si allunga oltre dove può arrivare.

translation.en: Will you let go?
As I was saying,
if the coconut is meant for us,
translation.it: se la noce di cocco è destinata a noi,

translation.en: it will be within reach.
Mm. Not today.
Out of the light!
No, no, no, no!
-We live in a world of rules and order. -Oh?
translation.it: Viviamo in un mondo di regole e ordine.

translation.en: Observe.
Think of my palm as our universe.
translation.it: Pensa al mio palmo come al nostro universo.

translation.en: Compared with this greatness,
one little monkey is an insignificant pebble.
translation.it: una piccola scimmia è un insignificante sassolino.

translation.en: Only the Immortal Ones in heaven are free to live without rules.
translation.it: Solo gli Immortali in cielo sono liberi di vivere senza regole.

translation.en: Know your place, young one.
[elder monkey] Come back here right this minute!
Out of the light!
Come back!
-Run! The demon is here! -Oh.
Your recklessness drew the Demon of Havoc upon us.
translation.it: La tua scelleratezza ha attirato il Demone del Caos.

translation.en: You don't belong here, outsider!
translation.it: Non sei il benvenuto qui, reietto!

translation.en: Coconut him.
Ha ha! Okay, imaginary family, give me some love.
Oh, too slow.
[elder monkey] Come. Gather 'round, young ones. Aw.
Feel the safety.
Feel your insignificance.
-Breathe-- -Nap time's over!
-You again? -You're in danger! Follow me and-- [gasps]
I, uh, thought that would play out differently.
Come on! It's getting away!
You fool! You think you're some kind of hero?
But I can beat that thing.
And save the baby? Sure. If there's time.
translation.it: - Salverai il piccolo? - Se avanza tempo.

translation.en: With what? Coconuts?
Coconuts are no threat to the Demon of Havoc.
-He could get a weapon. -Ha. From where?
Oh, oh, I know! From the Dragon King.
Yeah, the Dragon King.
[scoffs] At the bottom of the sea?
If you go out there, you will die.
[scoffs] Says you.
Crazy fool!
One weapon coming right up.
[henchman 1] Coming to the stage, let's give it up for…
[henchman 2] The reptile of style.
The overboard overlord.
With the sweetest vocal cords.
[both] The Dragon King!
My loyal subjects…
this grand column has stood here since the dawn of time.
translation.it: questa maestosa colonna si erge qui sin dall'alba dei tempi.

translation.en: It has waited patiently for the mightiest, fiercest rebel
translation.it: Ha atteso paziente la venuta del ribelle più forte,

translation.en: with the best style, of course,
to free its monumental potential.
translation.it: perché liberasse il suo monumentale potenziale.

translation.en: That rebel is me!
My gorgeous machine will unleash the column's power
translation.it: La mia magnifica macchina libererà il suo potere,

translation.en: to create the greatest storm the world has ever seen.
translation.it: per generare la tempesta più grande che il mondo abbia mai visto.

translation.en: You talk?
You've been waiting for me? How long?
Well, five minutes isn't--
Five thousand years?
The days when sea creatures are looked down upon
translation.it: I giorni in cui le creature marine venivano sminuite

translation.en: by those air-breathing dry-landers are over!
translation.it: dagli abitanti dei Territori Aridi sono finiti.

translation.en: You're looking for the most powerful being?
No way! I'm actually on a quest for the ultimate weapon!
translation.it: Non ci credo! Io cerco l'arma più potente di tutte!

translation.en: -What are the odds, man? -[column hums]
There's gotta be some way we can help each other.
translation.it: Ci sarà pure un modo di aiutarci a vicenda.

translation.en: If you were just a little smaller, maybe I could--
translation.it: Se solo fossi un po' più piccolo, potrei…

translation.en: Let our conquest begin!
But first, a song. And five, six, seven, eight!
translation.it: Ma prima, una canzone. Cinque, sei, sette, otto.

translation.en: -Whoa! -Is this part of the show?
-What is happening? -[henchman 2] Look out!
[Dragon King] Someone's stealing the grand column! Is that a monkey?
translation.it: Qualcuno ruba la colonna! Quella è una scimmia?

translation.en: You are incredible!
-[cuttlefish] Excuse me, sire, but-- -Zip it. I have a call to make.
translation.it: - Scusate, sire… - Zitto. Devo fare una chiamata.

translation.en: I demand satisfaction.
Oh, it's you. What is it? I'm busy.
A monkey stole my grand column.
So?
So? Someone could do a lot of damage with that thing. Theoretically.
translation.it: Potrebbero fare dei danni con quella cosa, in teoria.

translation.en: You're a king. You handle it. I believe in you.
translation.it: Sei un re, risolvila. Credo in te.

translation.en: Perhaps you could escalate this to the big guy? Delegate up?
translation.it: Potresti parlare col pezzo grosso. Portare la questione in alto.

translation.en: Ah, let's see. "Dear Buddha."
"Remember that stone monkey you said to leave alone?"
translation.it: sai quella scimmia che dovevamo lasciar stare?

translation.en: "Well, it took a stick. We're all scared. Please save us."
translation.it: Beh, ha rubato un bastone. Che paura! Salvaci!"

translation.en: No. Not happening.
Very well. I shall take things into my own claws, and woe to those that-- Oh!
translation.it: Molto bene. Prenderò in mano la situazione e guai a chiunque…

translation.en: So it's the monkey who's the mightiest, fiercest rebel.
translation.it: Perciò è la scimmia il ribelle più forte.

translation.en: With the best style.
Yeah. And he swiped the one thing you need to take over the world.
translation.it: E vi ha tolto il mezzo per conquistare il mondo.

translation.en: -What a guy! -[growls]
Any other comments? Input? Friendly feedback?
-Not me. -Mm-mm. Nope.
No? Then draw me a bath!
[monkey 1 gasps] The outsider's back.
-[monkey 2] He didn't die. -[monkey 3] He got a weapon.
translation.it: Non è morto. Ha trovato un'arma.

translation.en: [scoffs] He got a stick.
We can do this, right?
Hold on? What do you mean "hold on"?
Wow!
-Stay here and keep a lookout. -[Stick murmurs]
Just hang on.
-I am hurrying. -[Stick shouts]
If you're so smart, you do it.
translation.it: Se sei così bravo, fallo tu.

translation.en: [monkey grunts] Stick, where are you?
-[Stick hums] -Not that way!
Wait! What are you doing?
-Monkey. -You're just making it angrier.
Stop, Stick!
Come back, Stick!
Oh yeah! Awesome. I get it now.
Wave bye-bye to the nice kitty.
What?
Bad kitty god! Ow, ow, ow, ow, ow!
[monkeys chanting] Monkey King! Monkey King!
"Monkey King"! Yes.
translation.it: "Monkey King." Sì! Mi piace, suona bene.

translation.en: I like it. Has a nice ring to it.
The ultimate weapon for the ultimate hero!
translation.it: L'arma più potente per l'eroe più potente!

translation.en: [elder monkey] Absurd!
You're a tiny pebble, remember?
He doesn't love you.
He just wants you to love him!
translation.it: Vuole solo che voi lo adoriate!

translation.en: You'll never be one of us.
translation.it: Non sarai mai uno di noi.

translation.en: You're a selfish, rebellious fool,
translation.it: Sei uno sciocco ribelle ed egoista

translation.en: who will end up all alone.
[scoffs] I'm not alone. I have my Stick.
translation.it: Non sono solo. Ho il mio bastone.

translation.en: That weapon should be wielded by one of the Immortal Ones.
translation.it: Quell'arma dovrebbe essere brandita da uno degli Immortali.

translation.en: So wait. You're saying I should be an Immortal One?
translation.it: Dici che dovrei diventare un Immortale?

translation.en: -What? No! -Ah, that's interesting.
They do whatever they want up there, right? That's me.
translation.it: Fanno ciò che vogliono, no? Mi si addice.

translation.en: No rules. Me again.
-Best weapons? Uh-huh. Very much us. -[Stick murmurs]
translation.it: Le migliori armi? Ci si addice, sì!

translation.en: You're right. I don't belong here.
I belong with them!
[monkeys] Monkey King!
They'd never accept the likes of you.
translation.it: Non accetteranno mai uno come te.

translation.en: I conquered a demon.
You'd have to defeat a hundred demons to even get their attention.
translation.it: Dovresti batterne cento solo per avere la loro attenzione.

translation.en: -Oh yeah. -[elder monkey scoffs]
translation.it: Oh, già. Mi sa che hai ragione.

translation.en: -I suppose you're right. -[scoffs] Of course I'm right.
translation.it: Oh, già. Mi sa che hai ragione. Certo che ce l'ho.

translation.en: One hundred demons coming up!
♪ Who's the handsome hero We all love and adore? ♪
translation.it: Dimmi chi è l'eroe che tutti noi salverà

translation.en: ♪ Monkey King! ♪
♪ Who has demons screaming When he knocks on their door? ♪
translation.it: Lui sconfigge i demoni e paura non ha

♪ Who's a mighty fighter Who is brave and spunky ♪
♪ And also a bit of a hunk? ♪
translation.it: Un bel fusto possente che adorerai

translation.en: ♪ He's the Monkey King! ♪

translation.en: ♪ Who's the ape you can't escape When he hunts you down? ♪
♪ Monkey King! ♪
♪ Who's the chimp All the simple people will crown? ♪

translation.en: ♪ Monkey King! ♪
♪ Who's the simian you'll find shimmying Up to the top ♪

translation.en: ♪ And you know he won't stop Till he's won? ♪
♪ That's right, it's the Monkey King! ♪
translation.it: - Lui è il grande… - Monkey King!

translation.it: Novantanove demoni battuti. Ne manca uno.

translation.en: Hey, hero here.
Once-in-a-lifetime hero meetup.
-Where is everyone? -[girl gasps]
Anyone need a hero?
-[woman 1] Go away! -[woman 2] Leave us alone!
translation.it: - Via! - Ti sentirà! - Vai! - Ci farai uccidere!

translation.en: [man] You'll get us killed!
Name's Monkey King.
AKA the Simian Savior. AKA the Legendary Demon Slayer.
translation.it: Noto come il Salvatore Scimmiesco e l'Ammazza-Demoni.

translation.en: And Stick.
Our amazing skills include pole-fighting, punching,
kicking, a kick-pole punch combo, the double-kick with or without Stick,
translation.it: calci, combo tripla, doppio calcio con o senza asta,

translation.en: or the ever-popular fake kick with a spinning pole.
translation.it: o la celebre finta con asta rotante.

translation.en: I've never heard of you. -Well, I've never heard of you either. -[Stick murmurs]
translation.it: - Mai sentito. - Neanch'io ho mai sentito te.

translation.en: This village needs one of the Immortal Ones.
-Not a monkey with a fancy stick. -[Stick murmurs]
translation.it: Non una scimmia e un bastone.

translation.en: This dump counts as a village? Come on!
-He's just gonna make it worse. -[scoffs] Get rid of him.
translation.it: Peggiorerà solo le cose. - Mandalo via. - Grazie dell'offerta.

translation.en: Well, thanks for stopping by.
I don't think you're getting how great I am--
translation.it: Forse non è chiaro chi sono…

translation.en: He's the real deal, folks. A living legend.
translation.it: È il numero uno, gente. Una leggenda.

translation.en: I am? I mean, of course I am.
If you've got a demon situation, this is your guy.
translation.it: Se avete un demone, vi aiuterà.

translation.en: Where did you even come from, kid?
I've never seen her before, and I'm the mayor's wife. I know everyone!
translation.it: Mai vista. E sono la moglie del sindaco. Conosco tutti!

translation.en: You'd better get to know us. Unless you wanna be demon dumplings.
translation.it: Vi conviene conoscerci o diventerete ravioli per demoni.

translation.en: Okay. Whisper time.
Maybe the demon will eat the monkey.
And leave us alone.
Either way, we win.
Oh, I like it. Break!
Brave warrior.
My poor, dear child was just kidnapped.
translation.it: Il mio bambino è stato rapito.

translation.en: -Fire beast? That'll be a hundred demons. -[Stick shouts]

translation.en: -I'm in. Okay, desperate peasants. -Where's he going?
translation.it: Ci sto. Ok, tristi villici. Dove va?

translation.en: -Let's talk about my ascension ceremony. -Ascension ceremony?
translation.it: Parliamo della Cerimonia dell'Ascensione. - Cerimonia? - Cosa?

translation.en: -Your what? -My big victory party.
translation.it: - Cerimonia? - Cosa? La mia festa di vittoria per accedere agli Immortali.

translation.en: How else will the Immortal Ones know it's time to come get me?
translation.it: La mia festa di vittoria per accedere agli Immortali.

translation.en: -Okay, I'll need a 35-piece orchestra. -No!
-A 100-person dragon dance. -No dancing.
And a huge fireworks extravaganza.
My fireworks? Too expensive.
Unfortunately, ours is but a poor rice-farming village.

translation.en: -Yeah, poor. -[girl scoffs]
How insulting. Come on, King. We're walking.
-Stop them! -Uh, uh…
Please, won't you and your assistant reconsider?

translation.en: Only your number one fan.
I mean, this guy took down the white bone demon, the red bone demon, and the bone demon of no specific color.
translation.it: Questo tizio ha battuto il demone bianco, quello rosso e quello incolore.

translation.en: We could sing songs about you, and I'll give you a grand speech.
translation.it: Ti scriveremo canzoni e io darò un discorso.

translation.en: -And? -Uh, name a street after you?
translation.it: - E? - Una strada in tuo nome?

translation.en: -And? -And?
Oh, oh, oh, oh, a big, fat shiny medal of solid brass.
translation.it: Una grossa medaglia lucente in ottone massiccio.

translation.en: Ooh, that will impress 'em. Okay. Next up. What's in it for my trusty companion?

translation.en: -The girl? -No! My wondrous stick.
-What's in it for him? -Um, what does it want?
translation.it: Che darete a lui? - Cosa vuole? - Cosa vuoi?

translation.en: What do you want? A guitar.
translation.it: - Cosa vuole? - Cosa vuoi? Una chitarra.

translation.en: But your stick can't play the guitar.

translation.en: And ten free guitar lessons.
Um, done?
-Done. -Hey, hey, hey, hey.
-Done. -[roaring]
-[Mayor's wife] Uh-oh. -The fire beast is outside.
translation.it: - Oh oh. - La bestia è qui fuori.

translation.en: Please don't let it hurt my innocent little child!
translation.it: Ti prego, salva il mio bambino!

translation.en: Don't worry.
The quicker I slay this fire demon, the faster we get to celebrate me.
translation.it: Prima stendo questo demone, prima festeggeremo me.

translation.en: [child whimpers] Please let me go!
[fire demon] Silence or I shall devour you!
Hey. I see you, demon.
-What are you doing? -Joining the Immortal Ones, duh.
translation.it: - Cosa fai? - Raggiungo gli Immortali, ovvio.

Daddy! The demon was so mean!

translation.en: There, there.
Wait. He's the kid?
What took you so long?
We had to find a hero.
-You're the worst daddy ever. -[Mayor] Now, son, don't hit Daddy.
translation.it: - Sei un papà terribile. - Non picchiare papà.

translation.en: Where's my snack? Hey! Ow!
Oh dear.
-What? -[Monkey King] That was for free.
How dare you challenge Red Girl, Monkey King?

translation.en: What's a Red Girl?
I am Red Girl!
[distorted] Quake in my presence and bow to my awesome power!
translation.it: Tremate in mia presenza e inchinatevi al mio potere!

translation.en: Hey, Red Girl, leave these poor, unattractive people alone.

translation.en: But the kids are ripest this time of year.

translation.en: -Yum, yum, yum, yum, yum. -[shrieks] Daddy!
So yummy!
Okay, Monkey King, what's the play? Are you gonna--

translation.en: Okay, little girl. I can take it from here.

translation.en: Get her, Monkey King!
-[Monkey King grunts] -[Red Girl] Hey, cut that out!
Behave!
Hey, you're a little scrawny for number 100, but we'll make it work.

translation.en: Bad monkey!
-[Monkey King] Like I care! -[Red Girl snarls]
Don't give up now. Ha! You're doing great.

translation.en: -[Monkey King laughs] -Hey, stop that! Ugh!
Congratulations! The Monkey King's last victim.
-You're gonna be famous. Ow! -[Red Girl yelps]
Uh-oh.
-Stick! -[Stick murmurs]
-Goodbye, Monkey! [laughs] -[Monkey King yells]
[Monkey King] Yes!
[yells] Frustrated!
That Monkey's gonna burn down the whole village.
-Come on, everyone. [grunts] -[man] Come on!
Agh! My fireworks shop!
-Over here. -Water coming up.
Toss it, kid.
-Eat fire, loser! -Back at ya.
Do you really think you can defeat me?
No. I know it. [yells]
And for the beef dish, sire,
lettuce-wrapped or skewers?
Skewers it is.
-Daddy, I'm hungry! -Now, son--
[screams] It's the monkey!
Not my house!
Creepy.
Oh! Stick!
Burn, Monkey, burn!
Boom!
What a team!
Where did you get that stick?
It's fantastic!
Good idea, Stick. Hey, you want it?
Yeah, yeah, yeah! Gimme, gimme, gimme!
If you can hold it for ten seconds, it's yours.

-Four… Seven… -[Red Girl] Four… Seven…
-Five. -[Red Girl] Stop!
-[Monkey King] Four… Eight… -[Red Girl] One… Two…
Three… [yells]
You let go!
Yes!
One-hundredth demon vanquished!
-Monkey King reigns supreme! -[Stick protests] And Stick.

translation.en: -I will learn so much from you. -[groans] You're still here?

translation.en: Please. My name is Lin.
I am but a lowly peasant girl from a tiny village
who hopes to make a difference someday.
I offer my skills as your humble assistant and weapon-bearer.

translation.en: Wow. My own assistant?
Hard pass.
This monkey heroes alone.

Well, then, grab yourself a scroll and take notes because it's,

[Mayor's wife] Crazy monkey!
Kaboom! Yeah!

"He is the bravest, most spectac… spectac…"

"And now a song."

Yes.

-Yeah, we were promised gods! -They're coming. Move.

Stick? You never talked to me. Hey, hey, hey, hey. Who are you anyway?

-What? -Oh, look at his face.
-Low humidity. Arid climate. -[villagers] Ew!
Don't look at me! No, no, no. Be right back.
[Dragon King] So invigorating.
-…undersea ruler of the dragon kingdom. -What? Come on.
translation.it: - …sovrano del Regno dei Draghi. - Cosa? Ma dai.

translation.en: And you, sir, stole my stick.
translation.it: E tu, signorino, hai rubato il mio bastone.

translation.en: No, I didn't. I found it at the bottom of the ocean.
translation.it: No, l'ho trovato in fondo al mare.

translation.en: Right in the middle of some tacky palace.
Tacky? Once I reclaim my stick,
you and all these air-breathers will suffer my… my…
translation.it: tu e tutti i tuoi amici terrestri patirete la mia…

translation.en: Again?
Arid climate. No. Look away!
…suffer my wrath!
There's supposed to be a lightning crash.
And there it is. [laughs]
Hey, Babbo, how will we know when we're under the stick?
translation.it: Ehi, Babbo. Come troviamo il bastone?

translation.en: Easy. The stick will be right above us.
How will we know we took the right stick?
[scoffs] There's only one choice.
But what if we choose wrong, Babbo?
translation.it: E se prendessimo quello sbagliato, Babbo?

translation.en: Look at that armor.
Who even wears brass with gold?
Look, buddy, I hear ya. You love my stick. Everyone loves the stick.
translation.it: Ok, amico. Ho capito. Tu ami il mio bastone. Tutti lo amano.

translation.en: But no one appreciates the stick like I do.
translation.it: Ma nessuno lo apprezza come me.

translation.en: -[Stick murmurs urgently] -Quiet! The grown-ups are talking.
And now you're ruining my exclusive ceremony.
translation.it: E stai rovinando la mia cerimonia.

translation.en: Point is, Stick is not going anywhere.
translation.it: Il punto è che Bastone non va da nessuna parte.

translation.en: -Ain't that right, Stick? Buddy? -[henchman 2] Ow!
-Uh-oh. -Hey, are they with--
translation.it: - Oh oh. - Ehi! Loro sono con…

translation.en: -[dramatic music plays] -Stick, stay strong! I'm coming!
Oh no!
[Monkey King] Hang on, Stick!
What? [groans]
Babbo, I'm gonna get sick!
Stick, left!
And to the right!
Ha ha! You missed!
Stick, darling, it's Dragon.
-He's mine! -Jump in the tub!
He only listens to me, flaky.
I don't see a ring on it, honey! [grunts]
Itching! Flaking!
Of course! An avalanche.
-Hit the brake! -[Monkey King] Fun ride, huh?
-[henchmen groan] -[Monkey King] See ya!
-[henchman 2] Babbo! -[Babbo] Curse you, gravity!
Ha ha! Monkey King reigns supreme!
[Dragon King] Stick!
Catch me!
My palace is not tacky!
translation.it: Il mio palazzo non è pacchiano!

translation.en: [Lin panting] Gotcha!
Fear not, little girl. The villain is gone.
translation.it: Non temere, ragazzina. Il cattivo è andato.

translation.en: Maybe you're not as useless as I thought.
-So, do I have the job? -Um…
Nope.
[Lin] Oh, come on.
Twenty minutes, and still no invite from the Jade Emperor.
translation.it: Venti minuti e nessun invito dall'Imperatore.

translation.en: -What am I missing? -[murmurs]
Immortality! Of course. It's right in the name.
translation.it: L'immortalità. Ma certo! È proprio nel nome.

translation.en: To become an Immortal One, I need immortality!
translation.it: Per essere un Immortale, serve l'immortalità.

translation.en: [Lin] Maybe I can help.
Okay, look, kid. You see this?
Your palm?
No! I mean, yes. But no. This here is me.
translation.it: No! Cioè, sì. Ma no. - Questo sono io. - Ok…

translation.en: Okay?
And this tiny thing is you.
translation.it: E questa cosuccia minuscola sei tu.

translation.en: -Get it now? -Huh?
[Monkey King] I'm the universe hand,
and you're an insignificant, useless pebble.
translation.it: e tu sei un insignificante sassolino.

translation.en: Even a tiny pebble can make a big ripple, you know.
translation.it: Anche un sassolino può creare un'onda.

translation.en: [scoffs] That's just what a tiny pebble would say.
translation.it: È ciò che direbbe un sassolino.

translation.en: So, Stick, immortality, where do we go?
translation.it: Dunque, Bastone. Immortalità. Dove si va?

translation.en: Really? Huh.
-But how do we get there? -[Stick hums]
A graveyard? Spooky.
Grave… Gra…
-Graveyard. -You can't read.
Of course I can.
That's grass. That's the sky. That's a rock. See? Reading.
-Graveyard's that way. -Obviously.
translation.it: - Il cimitero è di là. - Ovvio.

translation.en: -[Stick hums] -No, no, no, no, no. We don't need her.
translation.it: No. Non abbiamo bisogno di lei.

translation.en: -He wants me to come. Doesn't he? -Just go home, kid.
translation.it: - Lui vuole che venga. - Vai a casa.

translation.en: I can't go home. There's trouble back there,
translation.it: Non posso. Ci sono guai, lì.

translation.en: and it made me do some things.
translation.it: E per questo ho fatto cose che non avrei dovuto.

translation.en: -Things I probably shouldn't have done. -Ooh! You killed someone?
translation.it: E per questo ho fatto cose che non avrei dovuto. - Un delitto? - No!

translation.en: I just wanna do big things someday. Like you.
translation.it: Voglio solo fare grandi cose. Come te.

translation.en: -I know. No. I-- -[Stick murmurs] -Yes, but-- -[Stick murmurs]
translation.it: Lo so. No, io… Sì, ma…

translation.en: How much reading could we possibly need?
translation.it: Quanto mai ci sarà da leggere?

translation.en: -[Stick murmurs] -Fine. I said fine! [sighs]
So, assistant girl,
you coming or what?
[Lin] So, where to next?
In there? Us? How?
This. It's like an all-access VIP pass.
translation.it: Lui. È come un pass VIP.

translation.en: Any realm, any dimension. Even the Land of the Dead.
translation.it: Ogni regno. Persino quello dei morti.

translation.en: But you're not dead.
And if all goes well, never will be.
translation.it: E se va bene, non lo sarò mai.

translation.en: Okay. If we're gonna fit in, we gotta dress the part.
translation.it: Ok, ora dobbiamo entrare nella parte.

translation.en: [coughs] What the heck?
[Monkey King] Not heck.
Hell.
Try to keep up.
Are we even supposed to be here?
Absolutely not. Isn't it great?
translation.it: Certo che no! Non è grandioso?

translation.en: See, the day you're supposed to die is recorded in the Scroll of Life and Death.
translation.it: Il giorno della tua morte è scritto in una pergamena.

translation.en: But if my name should somehow get crossed out,
translation.it: Se cancello il mio nome da lì,

translation.en: then no death registered, and guess who's immortal?
Me! [laughs]
One more thing. Die in hell, stay in hell. So don't die.
translation.it: Un'altra cosa. Se muori qui, ci rimani. Occhio.

translation.en: This is a bad idea.
[demon] Next.
Act like a ghost.
Oh yeah. Great. You're giving me chills.
translation.it: Così, brava. Mi metti i brividi.

translation.en: King here! Coming through!
Make way.
Next! Release form. [groans]
You brought a live chicken to the underworld?
translation.it: Hai portato un pollo vivo negli inferi?

translation.en: No living things allowed!
We really should go now.
[scoffs] Watch and learn, Pebble.
Oh no.
That's better. Pit of Infinite Agony. Fourth floor on your right. Next!
translation.it: Meglio. Fossa dell'Eterna Agonia. Quarto piano a destra. Il prossimo!

translation.en: Yes, good morning.
I'd like a quick glance at the Life and Death Scrolls.
Release form first.
It's in my other armor?
Rejected! [growls]
-Release form. -Back to the world of the living.
Not so fast.
-As my assistant, your first duty… -[Lin groans]
…is to be the sacrificial lamb.
-What are you doing? -She's alive? Here in hell?
-What? -You're alive!
How scandalous!
And you cut in front of all these people?
translation.it: E hai pure saltato la fila?

translation.en: -What? -No living things allowed!
-Oh, Monkey! -[Monkey cackles]
Uh, uh, I… I'm not…
I couldn't be more dead. Fresh corpse here.
How did you die?
Old age. No, I mean scurvy. Earthquake?
A duel. Two duels.
Here's the story.
I fell… off a cliff into a hole filled with sharks.
translation.it: Sono caduta da un dirupo in una fossa piena di squali.

translation.en: Rabid sharks.
And then a house fell on me,
and I drowned. Yeah.
Okay, you're in.
Chamber of Ridiculous Deaths. Fifth floor down the hall.
translation.it: Camera delle Morti Ridicole. Quinto piano in fondo.

translation.en: Next!
-[screams] -[ghost] What a guy.
-Hey! -[screams]
Monkey! You abandoned me in the middle of hell.
You don't leave a teammate behind.
What teammate? You're an assistant. An insignificant pebble.
translation.it: Socia? Sei un'aiutante. Un insignificante sassolino.

translation.en: -Stop calling me that. -Absolutely.
As soon as you find my scroll so I can cross my name off. Come on.
translation.it: Ma prima trova la mia pergamena. Andiamo.

translation.en: -[grunts] This shouldn't take long. -[Lin gasps]
[Lin] What?
Get reading.
What's your family name? Don't have one. I was born from a rock.
translation.it: - Il tuo cognome? - Non ce l'ho. Sono nato da una roccia.

translation.en: A rock?
More of a rock egg. The scrolls list your family history.
translation.it: Una roccia-uovo. Le pergamene parlano della tua famiglia.

translation.en: I must have parents, right?
Well, I guess.
Everyone does.
Ha! Looking for your scrolls? [laughs]
My scroll? Why does he have my scroll?
translation.it: La mia? Perché ha la mia?

translation.en: You don't belong here, outsiders.
Oh ho! Time to defeat demon 101.
translation.it: È ora di battere il demone numero 101.

translation.en: [demon] Mighty brush! Stamp of doom!
Open! Hyah!
-[clone 1] Don't let them get away! -[clone 2] Capture them!
[clone 3] Stop the monkey!
Through 115.
-Clones, eh? -[Stick murmurs]
I can? Really? Cool!
Monkey King reigns supreme!
Bring it! [grunts]
Not the beard!
Next!
-Wait! Time-out. I'm not a part of this. -Nobody's on the bench!
translation.it: - Fermo. Io non c'entro. - Niente panchinari.

translation.en: -[demon] Get her! -[Monkey King] Duck!
Got 'em.
Monkey, I got 'em. This one's mine. Huh?
translation.it: Monkey, eccole. Questa è la mia.

translation.en: Hey! Not yours!
What's it say about my family? [yells]
It says
you don't have one.
Oh. I'm all alone?
I'm sorry, Monkey. -Which means-- -[demon grunts]
Oof! I'm an original!
One of a kind!
-Give me that scroll. -Third line from the bottom.
Step away from the scroll, you flea-bitten, mortal lowlife! Close!
translation.it: Sta' lontano dalla pergamena, pulcioso mortale! Chiuditi!

translation.en: Come on!
Got it.
[grunts] Yeah, baby!
Oh, her.
Ow! That hurt.
And now I'm immortal!
Even for hell, this is bad.
What's up, Yama? Or should I say, what's down? [laughs]
translation.it: Che succede, Yama? O meglio, che giù-ccede?

translation.en: I beseech you. A rogue primate has invaded hell and-- Ow!
translation.it: Ti scongiuro. Un primate ha invaso gli inferi e…

translation.en: Hey, uh, Jade Emperor, right? Listen, great news.
translation.it: Ehi! Imperatore di Giada, no? Buone notizie.

translation.en: Get the Immortal Ones together. I'm on my way. We're gonna be neighbors.
translation.it: Raduna gli Immortali. Arrivo. Saremo vicini di casa!

translation.en: So you're the Monkey King. Gonna party at your banquets.
translation.it: - Così tu sei Monkey King. - Verrò ai tuoi banchetti.

translation.en: -Get hammered. -Release form!
-We're gonna share battle stories. -Please. You're not one of us.
translation.it: - Parleremo di battaglie… - Tu non sei uno di noi.

translation.en: Actually, I am. Crossed my name out and everything.
translation.it: In realtà, sì. Ho cancellato il mio nome.

translation.en: That only makes you half-immortal.
translation.it: Ti rende solo immortale a metà.

translation.en: -Half? -You can't die of old age.
Oh, that's great!
But you can still die in battle.
Don't look at me. This was your plan.
translation.it: Non guardare me. Era il tuo piano.

translation.en: Well, this is new information.
So, how exactly does one get full immortality?
You don't. Not possible.
Well, there is The Book of Everlasting Life, my lord.
translation.it: C'è il Libro della Vita Eterna, signore.

translation.en: -You shut your beard hole right now! -My bad.
-Stick, door! -[Stick murmurs]
Assistant, book! Monkey, stay handsome.
translation.it: Aiutante, il libro! Monkey, resta fico.

translation.en: Whatever you do, don't let him leave with that book!
translation.it: Non lasciarlo scappare con quel libro!

translation.en: Let's go.
-[Yama grunts] -[Monkey King] Make way!
Catch him! Catch him!
No, no, no, no, no, no, no! Monkey!
Ha! Well, that was fun. You got the book?
translation.it: È stato uno spasso! Hai preso il libro?

translation.en: -Uh, um, uh… -You didn't lose it, did you?
You had one job!
One job and you blew it!
-Just messing with you! -Do you treat all your friends like this?
Friends? Whoa, okay. You're more like a teammate on my very critical mission.
translation.it: "Amici"? Oh, ok. Sei più un'alleata nella mia missione.

translation.en: Well, that's better than a pebble.
All right. Moving on. See this?
This book can tell us how I can get my full immortality.
translation.it: Mi dirà come diventare del tutto immortale.

translation.en: Okay. Uh, it says…
Oh. "Full immortality can be attained by eating a magical peach
from the Enchanted Orchard of Everlasting Life."
translation.it: nel Frutteto Incantato della Vita Eterna."

translation.en: Ooh! Where's that?
This could take a while.
And I will give you five minutes.
translation.it: E io ti darò cinque minuti.

translation.en: This monkey's insane.
Oh really? He gets in fights, insults the gods.
translation.it: - Sul serio? - Fa a botte, insulta gli dei.

translation.en: He just stole a book from hell! Oh yeah, did I mention? We went to hell!
translation.it: Ha rubato negli inferi. Siamo stati negli inferi!

translation.en: Okay, let's bring the sass down to, like, a four, okay, sweetheart?
translation.it: Abbassiamo il tono a un livello quattro. Ok, tesoro?

translation.en: I can't keep this up. I can't do this. Listen, honey, we made a deal.
translation.it: - Non ce la faccio. Non posso farlo! - Cara, abbiamo un accordo.

translation.en: There's no backing out now.
Or did you forget?
[sighs] I remember.
[Lin] I beseech you, divine dragon.
End our suffering.
Our crops are dying.
Could you please grace us with a rainstorm?
-[groans] We've been searching forever! -What?
translation.it: Lo cerchiamo da una vita! Cosa?

translation.en: Why aren't the "wanted" posters working?
But we put them up everywhere, Your Grace. There's one.
translation.it: Ma li abbiamo affissi ovunque. Eccone uno.

translation.en: What is this?
I told you to draw the monkey, you dimwit!
But, sire, monkeys are so much harder to draw than sticks.
translation.it: Ma, sire, era più facile disegnare un bastone.

translation.en: -No, wait, wait! -[yells] What the--
[gasps] Divine Master of Weather. Thank you for answering my call.
How dare you, a mere mortal, speak to his lordship.
translation.it: Come osi, mortale, rivolgerti a un re?

translation.en: -Avert your eyes. -[Lin] My apologies.
We have no food here. No water.
Could you please, please send us rain?
Well, aren't you a presumptuous little snack.
translation.it: Beh, sei proprio uno spuntino presuntuoso.

translation.en: Wait, please!
I'll do anything. You must need something. An assistant. A servant.
translation.it: Farò di tutto. Ti farò da aiutante, da serva.

translation.en: A human servant? Ha!
He already has two perfectly good and trusted advisors. We carry his tub.
translation.it: - Ha già due consiglieri fidati. - Portiamo la sua vasca.

translation.en: [laughs] No! No. But perhaps our monkey would.
translation.it: No, ma potresti aiutare la nostra scimmia.

translation.en: Monkey?
Would you lie for me? Get your paws dirty?
translation.it: Mentiresti per me? Ti sporcheresti le zampe?

translation.en: You'll have to be manipulative, vicious, and cunning.
Do you have that in you, you scrumptious, sweet little thing?
Because when you make a deal with me, you follow through or…
translation.it: Perché quando fai un patto con me, o lo porti a termine o…

translation.en: It's chapped lips for you! [laughs]
Benbo, he eats her.
Oh! Yeah, that too. [laughs]
Okay. I accept.
Befriend a certain monkey, earn his trust, and take his stick.
translation.it: Avvicina una certa scimmia, ottieni la sua fiducia e il suo bastone.

translation.en: When it's in my possession,
you'll get your rain.
He never lets the stick out of his sight.
translation.it: Non lo perde mai di vista.

translation.en: The sooner it's in my grip, the faster you'll get your drip, drip, drip.
translation.it: Prima avrò il bastone, prima avrai il tuo acquazzone.

translation.en: Well, now he's got me searching this stolen book for some Orchard of Everlasting Life.
translation.it: Ora mi fa cercare questo Frutteto Incantato della Vita Eterna!

translation.en: He's still trying to join the Immortal Ones? [laughs]
translation.it: Cerca ancora di diventare un Immortale?

translation.en: What a fool.
What should I do?
Hm. He wants an enchanted peach now, does he?
Oh, well, I'll just have to put on a little show and give him one. [laughs]
translation.it: Beh, faremo questa sceneggiata e gli daremo la sua pesca.

translation.en: All you need to worry about is getting him there.
translation.it: Tu dovrai solo pensare a portarlo lì.

translation.en: You sure this is the right way to get to that fancy peach orchard?
translation.it: Sicura sia questa la strada per il frutteto?

translation.en: Yeah, definitely.
-[Monkey King grunts] Woo-hoo! -[Lin] Do you have to go top speed?
This? Ha! Please.
-I'll show you top speed. -No, no, no. I--
Hey!
Now, any personal assistant of mine really needs to be in the moment.
translation.it: Come mia aiutante, devi essere sempre presente.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah.
You need to be more focused and pay better attention.
translation.it: Devi essere più concentrata e attenta.

translation.en: I need to know you'll always have my back.
translation.it: Devo poter sempre contare su di te.

translation.en: He's coming back. He's coming back.
[Monkey King] And my shoes perfectly shined.
He's not coming back!
It's the attention to detail that I value most.
translation.it: Per me, conta l'attenzione al dettaglio.

translation.en: Where to next? The hills? The desert?
translation.it: Dove si va ora? Le alture? Il deserto?

translation.en: Aw, man!
Trees.
So many trees.
I could've died peacefully in my village, but, no!
translation.it: Potevo morire serena nel mio villaggio, ma no!

translation.en: Chamber of Ridiculous Deaths, here I come.
♪ Who's the handsome hero We love and adore? ♪
translation.it: Dimmi chi è l'eroe che tutti noi salverà

translation.en: ♪ Monkey King! ♪
Man, that's really catchy.
Help!
-Where is she? -[Lin screams]
Oh, there you are. Did you hear any of my performance evaluation?
translation.it: Oh, eccoti. Hai ascoltato la mia valutazione?

translation.en: -[Stick murmurs] -You are crazy!
And handsome.
If you're gonna be critical, be fair.
Places, everyone. Places!
Almost showtime.
Buzz for me, Babbo. Buzz!
[groans] Must I, sire?
Come on. Sell it.
Look at my little stinger!
-I'm adorable! -All right, Benbo, less is more.
He's never gonna buy this. Does this look like an enchanted peach garden?
translation.it: Non ci cascherà mai. Vi pare un vero frutteto magico?

translation.en: If you believe it, so will your audience. Here are the new sides.
Try not to step on each other's lines. Keep the scene contained.
I only had time to poison one tree.
translation.it: Ho potuto avvelenare un solo albero.

translation.en: The toxin should take only a few moments to knock him out cold.
translation.it: In pochi attimi, le tossine lo stenderanno.

translation.en: Remember, the tree in the light has the peach he should bite.
translation.it: Ricordate. Albero illuminato, frutto va mangiato.

translation.en: If it's hidden by night, then the fruit isn't right. Got it?
Okay. If the tree is in light, then, um, uh…
-It's the peach he should bite. -Oh yeah. So definitely not that tree.
translation.it: - Il frutto va mangiato. - Ok, quindi non quello.

translation.en: Yes, exactly that tree.
But that tree's not white. It's more of a brown.
translation.it: Ma più che bianco è marrone.

translation.en: No, not the color!
I lit it up for you. See?
Still nothing?
So, it's a glowing tree?
Exactly. Wow.
And once the monkey passes out, I'll grab the stick and--
translation.it: E quando la scimmia sverrà, prenderò il bastone…

translation.en: Oh, here they come.
Everybody back to one. Hit your marks. And let's have some fun out there.
translation.it: Tutti ai propri posti. E cerchiamo di divertirci.

translation.en: Whoopsie-daisy!
This one? No. That one.
Ugh. This peach grove looks kinda shabby. Are you sure this is--
translation.it: Questo posto è squallido. Sei sicura che sia…

translation.en: Oh yeah. One bite of the magical fruit, and you get full immortality.
translation.it: Sì. Assaggia il frutto magico e diventerai immortale.

translation.en: ♪ Behold this magic garden ♪ ♪ Full of magic nature ♪
translation.it: Guardate che giardino Pieno di magia

translation.en: ♪ It's the Orchard of Everlasting Life ♪
translation.it: È il Frutteto della Vita Eterna

translation.en: ♪ We are the magic guardians ♪
translation.it: Noi siamo i guardiani, gli impollinatori

translation.en: ♪ And the pollinators Of this magic orchard ♪
translation.it: Noi siamo i guardiani, gli impollinatori Puoi scommetterci il bastone È la verità

translation.en: ♪ Which is definitely real ♪
translation.it: Puoi scommetterci il bastone È la verità

translation.en: I don't know why, but I like these guys.
translation.it: Non so perché, ma mi piacciono quei due.

translation.en: Oh yeah, totally.
♪ Ha, ha, ha, ha, ha! Handsome, hairy stranger ♪ ♪ We are the protectors ♪
translation.it: Ascolta bel musetto Siamo i protettori

translation.en: ♪ Of the nectar of immortality ♪
♪ We promise there's no danger ♪ ♪ So eat a poison peach ♪
translation.it: - Assaggia un pezzo - Delle pesche velenose…

translation.en: ♪ I mean, the peaches that are juiciest Are in that glowing tree ♪
translation.it: Intendo dolci pesche Che trovi in quantità

translation.en: ♪ Hopefully ♪
Stand back.
I'm not feeling anything special.
Hey, do I look immortal?
-Hm, well-- -Or maybe it's the tree over here.
That's ridiculous. The one in the light has the juiciest--
Stick to the pages!
Maybe it's this tree. The one in the dark. That's the most delicious.
translation.it: Forse è l'albero all'oscuro. È il più squisito.

translation.en: Hold it. Let me check.
Nope. Definitely not as juicy as the one--
The tree in the dark…
Uh, what's wrong with this one?
…has the tastiest bark. [laughs]
That seems suspicious.
No, no, no, no. This is definitely the right tree.
-Eat it. -No, you eat it.
-No, you eat it. -No improv.
-You eat it first. -You eat it.
-[Monkey King] You eat it. -Come on. Just eat it. Yum.
How about at the same time?
Fine. Immortality, here I come.
I don't feel anything. What?
Oh, wait. Maybe I do.
I feel good!
Me too!
Maybe you should just sit down.
Hey! Buzz off, lady, and mind your own…
translation.it: Ronza via, signorina! E fatti gli affa…

translation.en: Beeswax?
No! Beeswax.
Clear the stage. I'll take that stick. Thank you very much.
translation.it: Sgombrate il palco. Prenderò il bastone, grazie.

translation.en: -Hey, I know you. -[Lin gasps]
Oh, your skin's all cleared up. You are gorgy!
translation.it: La tua pelle è migliorata. Stai d'incanto!

translation.en: You must be from the Dang Dynasty!
Hey, hey, you gotta try these peaches, man.
You idiot!
Don't you realize what's in those
yummy, mouth-watering… [slurps]
Who wants to take a bath with me?
translation.it: Chi vuole fare il bagno con me?

translation.en: I do!
Yay!
[Monkey King] We're hot-tubbing with the dragon!
translation.it: Festa in vasca con il drago!

translation.en: [Dragon King] Everyone's gonna get crazy!
Oh man!
I loved those guys!
[groans] Those… Those are good people.
But the two of you are my best friends.
No. No, no, no, no. We're not friends.
The three of us, we're family.
What just… What just happened?
Dra… Uh, Dragon?
You awake?
-Agh! -Wait!
Did the peaches work? Am I fully immortal now?
-Knock my head off. -What?
Take my stick and whack me in the face. It's all right. Come on, come on. Do it.
translation.it: Colpiscimi in faccia. Andrà tutto bene. Fallo.

translation.en: I won't even feel it.
-[groans] Fine. I'll do it myself, wuss. -[Lin snarls]
translation.it: Va bene. Faccio da solo, fifona.

translation.en: -Those peaches were defective. -Maybe they're out of season.
translation.it: Le pesche erano difettose! - Forse non è stagione. - Cosa? Abbiamo fallito, Bastone.

translation.en: -What? Our quest has failed, Stick. -[Stick groans]
translation.it: - Forse non è stagione. - Cosa? Abbiamo fallito, Bastone.

translation.en: -[groans] -You're still half-immortal.
I don't do half-things. Yeah, I noticed.
translation.it: - Non faccio nulla a metà. - Sì, ho notato.

translation.en: This old geezer once told me all the things I couldn't do.
translation.it: Un vecchio mi diceva sempre cosa non fare.

translation.en: That I'd wind up alone.
Yeah. "You'll never amount to anything."
I heard that all the time back home. [sighs]
Wish I could relate.
Well, thanks for your help.
-I mean, it was mostly me. -You're leaving?
-It was nice knowing you, little girl. -But no!
[grunts] Don't go. You said we were family.
-No, I didn't. -You did. Doesn't sound like me.
-Well, you said it. -That was just the peaches talking.
But you promised we'd do big things. We can't give up now.
translation.it: Noi dovevamo fare grandi cose. Non molliamo.

translation.en: "We"? Who's this "we"?
I'm still gonna join the Immortal Ones. -Just not with you. -[Lin groans]
translation.it: Diventerò lo stesso un Immortale, solo senza di te.

translation.en: You know what? I'm starting to think that wasn't even the real peach orchard.
translation.it: Inizio a pensare che non fosse il vero frutteto.

translation.en: What? [laughs awkwardly]
You think I… I deliberately brought you to the wrong place?
translation.it: Credi che ti abbia sviato di proposito?

translation.en: L-L-Like some sort of… Like some sort of trap?
You're saying I lied to you?
I'm not not saying it.
You know what? Go ahead. Walk away. You're so selfish.
translation.it: Sai cosa c'è? Vattene pure. Sei un egoista.

translation.en: You only care about yourself.
-Well, no one else will. -Ugh! 'Cause you won't let them.
translation.it: - Nessun altro lo fa. - Non glielo permetti.

translation.en: Someday, you really will end up all alone.
translation.it: Un giorno, finirai davvero tutto solo.

translation.en: -What are you yapping on about? -[Stick murmurs]
Who's that? Assistant, what does it say?
translation.it: Chi è? Aiutante, che c'è scritto?

translation.en: "An authority on everlasting life, the royal sorceress, Wangmu,
translation.it: "Esperta di vita eterna, la maga Wangmu

translation.en: can often be found in her laboratory brewing her famous Elixir of Immortality."
translation.it: ha un laboratorio dove produce il suo celebre Elisir dell'Immortalità."

translation.en: We're back in the game! One sip and they'll have to accept me.
translation.it: Torniamo in pista! Un sorso e dovranno accettarmi!

translation.en: Way to go, Stick! Mwah!
You too, Pebble. What are we waiting for?
-But that's in heaven. -Monkey King reigns supreme!
translation.it: - Ma è in cielo. - Monkey King regna sovrano!

translation.en: Is that the Jade Palace?
Absolutely.
-[Monkey King] Woo-hoo! -What the--
[Lin] There she is. Wangmu.
translation.it: Eccola. Wangmu, la regina del cielo.

translation.en: The queen of heaven.
Yeah, whatever. Let's go make me immortal.
translation.it: Sì, interessante. Ora rendiamo me immortale.

translation.en: Locked.
No. No, no, no! Monkey!
Somewhere in this room are the ingredients for making the Elixir of Immortality.
translation.it: Qui ci sono gli ingredienti dell'Elisir dell'Immortalità.

translation.en: -Guess I'll just have to taste everything. -No. No. Wait.
-First thing we need is-- -Here goes nothing.
Hey, don't drink that.
-I'm just smelling it. -[Lin] Don't smell anything.
-[Monkey King screeches] -[Lin yelps]
-Hey! -[Monkey King laughs]
[grunts] Okay, Lin. You got this.
Don't look back. Don't look back. Don't… look… back.
Aw, you're just a scared little monkey.
translation.it: Oh, sei solo una scimmietta impaurita.

translation.en: No friends. No family.
You are alone.
Sorry, Monkey.
I can't fool around anymore.
My people are counting on me.
translation.it: La mia gente conta su di me.

translation.en: -Oh! Agh! -Gee, why'd you trash this place?
translation.it: Cavolo! Come hai ridotto questo posto?

translation.en: -We're guests here. -[Lin groans]
Show a little respect. Immortality Elixir?
translation.it: Siamo ospiti. Porta rispetto. Dov'è il mio elisir? Non ti pago per oziare.

translation.en: Hello? Come on. I'm not paying you to goof around.
translation.it: Dov'è il mio elisir? Non ti pago per oziare.

translation.en: Yeah. Uh-huh.
-We're not actually paying her, are we? -[Stick hums]
translation.it: Non la paghiamo sul serio, vero?

translation.en: Right. The first ingredient is…
There. A pinch of instant karma.
-Get mixing. -[woman] Stealing from an old lady?
You have no honor.
-Uh-oh. -[laughs] First, I punish you.
Then I shame you.
You can't shame me.
I have no shame.
And you have no exit.
Don't worry, kid. I'll take care of her.
Eat lightning, chimp! [laughs]
Immortality Elixir! Let's go!
A spoonful of chi. There! The blue jar.
translation.it: Un cucchiaio di chi. Là! Vaso blu.

translation.en: A spoonful of chi coming up.
-[Monkey King] What's next? -A drop of moon essence. The green jar.
translation.it: - Ok, poi? - Essenza di luna. - Vaso verde. - Scimmia cattiva!

translation.en: -Bad monkey! -[Monkey King] On it.
Ha! Missed!
Yes!
-That's it. -[Monkey] What else?
Last one. Nectar of peach. Yes! Um…
translation.it: - Solo il nettare di pesca. - Sì.

translation.en: -Yes! -[Wangmu growls]
-Here you go. -[Wangmu] This is going to sting!
translation.it: - Ecco a te. - Questo farà male!

translation.en: You call yourself a god? I'm so disappointed. What a bummer.
translation.it: E ti definisci una divinità? Che delusione, sul serio.

translation.en: Um, it's stuck! I-I need a spoon or chopsticks or--
translation.it: È incastrato. Mi serve qualcosa per…

translation.en: -Stick, help her. -[Stick yells]
-Perfect. -[Monkey King] Ha ha!
I think I did it!
-Taste this. [grunts] -Right.
Taste death!
That does it! [grunts]
[Monkey King] Nice punch, Grandma!
Your friend's not here to protect you now. [laughs]
translation.it: Ora non c'è il tuo amico a proteggerti.

translation.en: Uh, we're not friends. I'm his assistant.
His what?
[screams] I'm just a pebble.
I'm only after his stick. I need it to save my village from a drought.
translation.it: Voglio il suo bastone per salvare il villaggio.

translation.en: So, the thief's assistant is also a thief. [laughs]
translation.it: Ah, l'aiutante del ladro è a sua volta una ladra.

translation.en: Take his stick and go! The Jade Emperor will see you home.
translation.it: Prendi il bastone e vai. L'Imperatore ti condurrà a casa.

translation.en: What are you going to do to him?
That selfish creature doesn't care about you.
translation.it: A quell'egoista non importa di te.

translation.en: Run!
Ha ha! Stick, where are you?
-Whoa! -Back for more, Monkey?
translation.it: - Ne vuoi ancora, scimmia? - Oh oh.

translation.en: -Uh-oh. -[panting] Don't look back!
translation.it: - Ne vuoi ancora, scimmia? - Oh oh. Non voltarti.

translation.en: Don't look back! Don't look back.
-[Wangmu laughs] -No, not this time.
Goodbye, mortal.
Half-mortal.
You couldn't possibly think you were worthy to take your place here
translation.it: Non dirmi che credevi sul serio di meritare un posto qui,

translation.en: amongst us Immortal Ones.
That was fun.
-Monkey! -Agh!
What?
I love it when people tell me what I can't do.
translation.it: Adoro quando mi dicono cosa non posso fare.

translation.en: My lightning makes you stronger?
translation.it: I miei fulmini ti rendono più forte?

translation.en: I'm immortal!
And huge!
I'm one of you now.
You will never be one of us!
translation.it: Non sarai mai uno di noi!

translation.en: -Monkey! -Who's gonna stop me?
I summon the Immortal Ones!
-I'm already here! -[Lin] They're coming!
translation.it: - Io sono già qui! - Arrivano! Andiamo!

translation.en: -We gotta get out of here! -What are they gonna do? I can't die.
translation.it: - Io sono già qui! - Arrivano! Andiamo! Cosa mi faranno? Non posso morire.

translation.en: There are fates far worse than death.
translation.it: Ci sono destini peggiori della morte.

translation.en: We really should go now.
Bring 'em on! I am a god.
translation.it: Fatevi sotto! Io sono un dio.

translation.en: -Monkey! -What? I'm busy!
translation.it: - Monkey! - Che c'è? Ho da fare.

translation.en: Bet you can't catch me.
He's coming. He's coming. He's coming.
He's not coming!
You came back for me.
-What's your deal? -You came back for me!
I so could've beaten that old lady.
-But you didn't because you care. -No.
translation.it: - Ma ci tieni a me. - No.

translation.en: -Admit it. You care. Say it. -No!
-Say, "I care." -Never.
-Come on, admit it! -I admit nothing!
He so cares about me.
-[Stick murmurs] -I know!
He was all like, "We're not family. You're a tiny pebble."
translation.it: Prima dice: "Non siamo una famiglia. Sei un sassolino".

translation.en: -And then he saves me! [laughs] -[Stick laughs]
translation.it: E poi mi salva la vita!

translation.en: Are you two done? 'Cause I got to get to the Jade Palace.
-To do what? -Defeat all the Immortal Ones.
Then I'll become their ruler, the new king of heaven.
translation.it: E diventerò il nuovo re del cielo.

translation.en: Wait. Are you sure? Sounds kinda crazy.
Yep! Whatever the Monkey King does, he does big!
translation.it: Sì! Monkey King fa solo le cose in grande.

translation.en: -And you won't ever stop? -Not until the day I die.
-Which is? -Never! I'm immortal!
My thirst for new challenges will never end.
I'll never be satisfied. I'll never be fulfilled.
translation.it: Non sarò mai sazio, mai soddisfatto.

translation.en: Which, when I say it out loud, sounds incredibly depressing.
translation.it: Il che, detto ad alta voce, suona molto deprimente.

translation.en: Wow! Did I just curse myself?
translation.it: Wow! Mi sono maledetto da solo?

translation.en: Maybe defeating everyone isn't always the answer.
translation.it: Forse sconfiggere tutti non è sempre la risposta.

translation.en: Maybe you'd find happiness by,
I don't know, helping other people?
-That could be your new, uh, path. -Hm.
translation.it: Potrebbe essere la tua nuova strada.

translation.en: Say you could save a starving village by lending out the stick for--
translation.it: Salva un villaggio prestando il bastone a…

translation.en: My stick?
Okay. How about I rip off my tail and give that away too? I mean, come on.
translation.it: Il mio bastone? Ok. Sarebbe come staccarmi la coda, dai.

translation.en: You could save the lives of so many. Hard pass.
Me and Stick are meant for way bigger things.
translation.it: Io e Bastone faremo grandi cose.

translation.en: You wanna be happy, you help people.
translation.it: Se vuoi, aiutali tu gli altri.

translation.en: You can do great things.
I'm just a mortal.
You're the only mortal I know who's gone to hell and heaven in one day.
translation.it: Una mortale che è stata in cielo e negli inferi.

translation.en: That wasn't my accomplishment. That was you.
translation.it: Quello non è stato merito mio, ma tuo.

translation.en: When we were in hell, I read my scroll.
translation.it: Negli inferi, ho letto la mia pergamena.

translation.en: It said, "Lin, common peasant girl."
"Tried to make a difference. Never did."
translation.it: Non è mai riuscita a fare la differenza".

translation.en: [sighs] Does it have to end that way?
I don't know. Who's Lin?
translation.it: Non lo so. Chi è Lin?

translation.en: I'm Lin.
Oh! Hey, Lin. Monkey King. Nice to meet ya.
translation.it: Oh! Ciao, Lin. Monkey King. Piacere.

translation.en: Pleasure.
Buck up, Lin. No one thought I could make a difference, right?
translation.it: Su col morale. Nessuno credeva in me, no?

translation.en: But now look at me. The original outsider.
Fully immortal!
So don't let anyone, god, demon, old monkeys,
translation.it: Non permettere a nessuno, dei, demoni, scimmie,

translation.en: challenge you or stand in your way.
You want something,
don't ask.
-Just take it. -[Stick grunts]
-I've got a challenge. -Go on.
-It's a big one. -I'm listening.
How long do you think an immortal monkey can hold his breath under that water?
translation.it: Per quanto tempo puoi trattenere il fiato sott'acqua?

translation.en: Interesting.
I dunno.
Two, three years! [inhales deeply]
Don't be sad. You've done good, girl.
translation.it: Non essere triste. Sei stata brava.

translation.en: Go home. Your storm is coming.
translation.it: Vai a casa. Arriva la pioggia.

translation.en: Ah, I wasn't gonna make you wait the whole three.
translation.it: Non volevo farti aspettare tre anni.

translation.en: Forget it. Come on. Grab Stick, and we'll--
-Where's Stick? -I had no choice.
-He just needs to borrow it. -Borrow it?
-Where did you get that? -The Dragon King just--
My village is dying.
My family is dying.
The Dragon King can help them.
I trusted you, Lin. I saved you.
translation.it: Mi fidavo di te, Lin. Ti ho salvato.

translation.en: I saved you first. And I asked for your help.
translation.it: Ti ho salvato prima io. E ti ho chiesto aiuto.

translation.en: You said if I want something, don't ask. Just take it.
translation.it: Se vuoi qualcosa, prendilo e basta.

translation.en: -That's what you said. -[Monkey King growls]
I had to do it.
Well, hello, you.
That stick belongs to me!
Stickipoo here had a momentary fling,
translation.it: Bastoncino mio ha preso una piccola sbandata,

translation.en: but now he's come home.
translation.it: ma ora è tornato a casa.

translation.en: In fact, he'll be the guest of honor at my celebration tonight.
translation.it: Non solo, sarà l'ospite d'onore ai miei festeggiamenti di stasera.

translation.en: Invite only.
And a warm thanks to you for the help, my child.
translation.it: E un caloroso grazie a te per l'aiuto, bambina mia.

translation.en: Tell your village the drought is over.
translation.it: Di' al tuo villaggio che la siccità è finita.

translation.en: It's all over.
For you, your people, and the entire world!
translation.it: Per te, la tua gente e il mondo intero!

translation.en: The world?
No, we have to stop him.
-You betrayed me! -I had no choice.
translation.it: - Mi hai tradito! - Non avevo scelta.

translation.en: -We're still family, right? -I have no family.
translation.it: - Siamo una famiglia, no? - Non ho una famiglia.

translation.en: -I'll help you get Stick back. -Help me?
translation.it: - Ti aiuterò con Bastone. - Aiutarmi? Tu?

translation.en: You? An insignificant pebble?
translation.it: - Ti aiuterò con Bastone. - Aiutarmi? Tu? Un insignificante sassolino?

translation.en: This monkey heroes alone!
translation.it: Questa scimmia fa l'eroe da sola.

translation.en: I'll show you crazy.
translation.it: Ti faccio vedere chi è pazzo.

translation.en: But he destroyed my home.
Oh, Wangmu, if you can't stop a little monkey from smashing your roof--
translation.it: Wangmu, se non riesci a fermare una scimmietta che ti sfonda il tetto…

translation.en: [Babbo] Coming to the stage…
[Benbo] To finally kick off his world domination tour…
translation.it: A inaugurare il suo tour di dominazione mondiale…

translation.en: He's flashy.
He's splashy.
But don't mention his rashy.
[Benbo] Put your fins and tentacles together for…
translation.it: Battete quelle pinne e quei tentacoli per…

translation.en: [Babbo and Benbo] The Dragon King!
♪ Feeling weary, well, you oughta 'Cause dwelling underwater isn't swell ♪ ♪ Trust me, I know ♪
translation.it: Se ti senti annoiato e un po' disidratato Non è bello, purtroppo lo so

translation.en: ♪ You see, since birth I have fought a dermatology disorder ♪
translation.it: Fin dalla nascita ho sofferto Di un disturbo maledetto

translation.en: ♪ That has caused me sadness And woe, woe, woe ♪
♪ Whenever other kids saw me Under the sun's rays ♪
translation.it: Ogni volta che finivo Sotto i raggi del sole

translation.en: ♪ In no time, they'd be calling me A freak or a raisin ♪
♪ So I resigned myself To being left behind ♪
translation.it: Mi sono rassegnato Negli abissi son scappato

translation.en: ♪ Forever livin' in the H2O ♪
♪ But since then I've realized ♪
translation.it: Ma da allora ho capito che

translation.en: ♪ There's nothing wrong With being moisturized ♪
translation.it: Questa vita non fa per me

translation.en: ♪ Why should I stay below the shore? ♪
♪ Second-rate and inferior ♪
♪ To the air-breathing Land-walking sun kissers I despise? ♪
translation.it: Il rispetto per il loro nuovo re

translation.en: ♪ So watch me rise up, open the skies up ♪
translation.it: Io sono il drago più malvagio

translation.en: ♪ And take the world by storm ♪
♪ I'll flood the dry lands Low and highlands ♪
♪ He's taking the world by storm ♪
Yes, I am!
♪ For years, this un-phibian demon's Been rehearsing a scheme ♪
translation.it: Ho in mente un perfido piano Per il genere umano

translation.en: ♪ Now stand back 'Cause I'm gonna perform it ♪
♪ And nobody will deny my power When I take the world by storm ♪
translation.it: Io sono il più potente drago repellente Che il mondo mai vedrà

translation.en: -♪ No more sunshine, no more flowers ♪ -♪ Benbo, Babbo ♪
-♪ Only endless power showers ♪ -♪ Benbo, Babbo ♪
[Dragon King] ♪ No more groundhogs Or earthworms ♪
♪ And no more ruined frizzy perms ♪
♪ No more islands, no more nations ♪
♪ No more rain-checked invitations ♪
♪ No more sadness, no more crying ♪
♪ No more failed auditions ♪
translation.it: E sul gran finale scena muta

translation.en: ♪ Drying up on the big final ♪
translation.it: E sul gran finale scena muta Mai più farò

translation.en: [voice cracks] ♪ Note ♪
♪ Ever again ♪
♪ So watch me rise up ♪
♪ Open the skies up ♪
♪ And take the world by storm ♪
♪ I'm the top dragon ♪
♪ And he ain't braggin' ♪
♪ No, I'm taking the world by storm ♪
translation.it: No! Che il mondo mai vedrà

translation.en: ♪ Fortune favors the brave ♪
♪ So, baby, I'm making waves ♪
♪ So big they'll become the norm ♪
♪ So watch me rise up ♪
♪ Our king will reign ♪
-[Dragon King] ♪ Open the skies up ♪ -♪ He's makin' it rain ♪
♪ And take the whole dried world ♪
♪ By storm ♪
Salutations, dry-landers!
Who wants the honor of drowning first?
translation.it: Chi vuole l'onore di annegare per primo?

translation.en: -[Monkey King] Flaky! -Huh? Where's my Stick?
translation.it: Ehi, Squama! Dov'è il mio bastone?

translation.en: I believe I said invite only!
What do we do now?
I am the mighty Dragon King,
translation.it: Io sono il potente Dragon King,

translation.en: world-flooder, man-slayer--
Monkey punching-bag!
-Stop it! -Yeah!
Knock it off!
[Dragon King grunts] Stop!
-[Lin] I got ya. Head for high ground! -[child] Mama!
Everybody, get to the top of the hill!
Stop wrecking my clones!
-Monkey! You're not alone. I can help you! -[Monkey King snarls]
translation.it: Monkey! Non sei solo. Posso aiutarti!

translation.en: [Dragon King groans] Gotcha!
-[dramatic music plays] -Why won't you die?
I'm immortal, dummy!
How?
Those peaches were fake!
-[Lin] Dragon! -What?
-Your Majesty! -What?
[Lin] Spare my poor village, and I'll tell you his weakness.
translation.it: Risparmia il villaggio e ti dirò la sua debolezza.

translation.en: Agreed.
Lightning. It's the only thing that can defeat him.
translation.it: Fulmini. L'unica cosa che lo sconfigge.

translation.en: Fry him up. No one'll miss him.
-Jia you! Jia you! -[Monkey King grunts]
-Stick? -[Stick hums]
[Babbo] Oh no, not again!
-I missed you so much. -[Stick murmurs]
Thanks for the assist, child.
I'm not your assistant!
I'm his.
What?
This is so twisted!
Yes! That's it! Wring him out!
Okay, you can have the stick!
How about I get custody just on weekends?
translation.it: Che ne dici di lasciarmelo solo nei week-end?

translation.en: Are we fired? Oh yeah, we need a new career.
You did it. You defeated the Dragon King--
Monkey King reigns supreme!
Uh-oh.
Sir, you, uh…
[sighs] What is it now?
You're next.
[Jade Emperor] This has gone too far.
Hand me the Royal Horn of Desperation.
translation.it: Datemi il Corno Reale della Disperazione.

translation.en: But the Buddha said to let him find his own way.
translation.it: Ma Buddha ha detto di lasciarlo vivere.

translation.en: [scoffs] The Buddha speaks in riddles. No one understands him.
translation.it: Buddha parla per enigmi. Chi lo capisce?

translation.en: This ends now!
You shall spend your immortality alone,
translation.it: Passerai la tua immortalità da solo,

translation.en: reflecting on your crimes.
My crimes?
You could have accepted me.
Now I will reign supreme over all of you!
translation.it: Ora regnerò sovrano su tutti voi!

translation.en: Monkey! Stop!
-[Yama] Monkey! -[Monkey King laughs]
Monkey! Monkey!
It's me! It's Lin!
-[Monkey King growls] -Please, you have to stop.
♪ Who's the giant primate Who is making a mess? Monkey King! ♪
translation.it: Chi è il gigante scimmia che impazzirà? Monkey King

translation.en: I did this. I let this happen.
translation.it: È colpa mia. Ho lasciato che accadesse.

translation.en: [Monkey King] ♪ Monkey King! ♪
♪ Who can swing around The biggest stick… ♪
translation.it: Dimmi chi è che ha l'arma Più potente che c'è

translation.en: Please, he's not evil.
-[Monkey King laughs] -[Lin] He has goodness inside him.
He does care.
[Buddha] Then help him find his way.
translation.it: Allora aiutalo a trovare la sua strada.

translation.en: [Lin] What's happening?
[Buddha] Enlighten him.
What? But how do I do that?
Monkey King, stop!
Oh, whoa.
[deep voice] Monkey King, stop!
Monkey King is my old title.
translation.it: Non mi chiamo più Monkey King.

translation.en: You will address me as the Great Sage,
translation.it: Ti rivolgerai a me come il Grande Sapiente,

translation.en: equal of heaven!
How can we show him he's not the center of the universe?
translation.it: Come gli mostriamo che non è il centro dell'universo?

translation.en: I got it! [deep voice] I have a challenge for you, Great Sage.
translation.it: Ma certo! Ho una sfida per te, Grande Sapiente.

translation.en: Not interested!
translation.it: Non mi interessa! Di che si tratta?

translation.en: -What is it? -[Lin as Buddha] Something worthy of you.
The ultimate challenge.
What gives?
[Lin as Buddha] If you are powerful enough to leap from my palm,
translation.it: Se sarai abbastanza potente da saltare via dal mio palmo,

translation.en: the kingdom of heaven will be yours to rule.
translation.it: il regno del cielo sarà sotto il tuo comando.

translation.en: Hang on. What did he just say?
[deep voice] But if you fail, you will do a long penance here on Earth.
translation.it: Ma se fallirai, sconterai una lunga penitenza qui sulla Terra.

translation.en: Please. Too easy! [laughs]
I just have to leave your hand?
You're on, but you're gonna feel pretty foolish in about two sec…
translation.it: Accetto, ma ti sentirai uno stupido da qui a pochi secon…

translation.en: Cloud jump!
-[cat yelps] -I really hate that monkey.
This is the edge of the universe, Stick!
-[Stick squeals] -[Monkey King] I rule!
Yeah, I totally should. Just to prove I was here.
Ha ha! And now to make my other mark.
translation.it: E ora lasciamo un altro segno.

translation.en: -[Monkey King sighs] -[Lin as Buddha] Stop that, Monkey.
Uh, the Great Sage.
[Lin as Buddha] You never left my hand, Monkey King.
translation.it: - Non hai mai lasciato la mia mano. - Che cosa?

translation.en: Wait a second. No! No. No, no, no, no, no! No! No!
Whatever just happened, that's cheating! Do-over!
translation.it: Non so come, ma hai barato! Si rifà!

translation.en: Hard pass.
-Pebble? -[Lin laughs]
-Are you even supposed to be in there? -Absolutely not. Isn't it great?
translation.it: Ci puoi stare lì? No. Non è grandioso?

translation.en: You tricked me! Not fair! That's two against one.
translation.it: Mi hai ingannato! Sono in minoranza.

translation.en: I'm sorry. This is the only way to help you.
Stop! No, no, no, no, no! No! [strains]
No! Stick!
Well, guess what?
[grunts] This is so exactly what I wanted to happen.
Told you, you'd feel foolish. Ha ha.
[Buddha] Monkey King,
you are now on the path of meditation and self-reflection.
translation.it: ora sei sul sentiero della meditazione e della riflessione.

translation.en: I was born from a rock, you know?
translation.it: Sono nato da un roccia, sai?

translation.en: This is where I thrive! Monkey King reigns supreme! [strains]
translation.it: Qui dentro ci sguazzo! Monkey King regna sovrano!

translation.en: [Buddha] When you awake to nothingness,
you will have found your way.
Awake to nothingness. Whatever that means.
translation.it: Risvegliarmi nel nulla. Qualunque cosa significhi.

translation.en: I'll think about it.
He's just a little monkey looking for a place to belong.
translation.it: È solo una scimmietta che cerca il suo posto nel mondo.

translation.en: [Buddha] The Monkey King's scroll
is still to be written.
When he is ready,
the world will need him
translation.it: il mondo avrà bisogno di lui,

translation.en: as it has needed you.
translation.it: come ha avuto bisogno di te.

translation.en: Hey, Lin, where's our hero going today?
translation.it: Ehi, Lin! Dove va la nostra eroina?

translation.en: I'll be back by sunset.
[Babbo] And two extra-large milk tea bobas.
translation.it: E due tè extra-large con latte.

translation.en: Want honey with that? I made it myself.
translation.it: Ci vuoi il miele? L'ho fatto io.

translation.en: My gosh! How do I awaken to nothingness?
translation.it: Cavolo! Come ci si risveglia nel nulla?

translation.en: What does that even mean?
Be calm? Patient? Humble?
I'm the king of being humble!
[Lin] Monkey? Monkey.
Go away! I'm busy thinking of all the ways to get back at you.
translation.it: Vattene! Sono occupato. Sto pensando a come fartela pagare.

translation.en: Calmly.
I came to say goodbye before Buddha closes up your mountain.
translation.it: Sono venuta a salutarti, prima che Buddha chiuda la montagna.

translation.en: Oh, lucky me.
I know you're mad, but you were out of control.
[groans] Okay, you don't have to remind me.
Taking on all the gods probably wasn't my best idea.
translation.it: Forse sfidare gli dei non è stata una buona idea.

translation.en: I really messed up, didn't I?
Monkey, you were born from a rock,
translation.it: Monkey, sei nato da una roccia,

translation.en: abandoned by everyone.
Th-The gods hated you,
and all you ever wanted was to be loved.
translation.it: e tu non volevi altro che essere amato.

translation.en: [Lin] And you are!
You changed my life.
I made a difference. We both did.
translation.it: Ho fatto la differenza. Con te.

translation.en: I really am your number one fan.
translation.it: Sono la tua fan numero uno.

translation.en: Well, I guess a little pebble did make a big wave.
translation.it: Pare che un sassolino abbia creato una grande onda.

translation.en: With an assist.
Oh, that's good.
Me, your assistant?
Okay. Okay.
We helped each other.
Well, we didn't do it all alone.
translation.it: Non abbiamo fatto tutto da soli.

translation.en: Stick! Buddy! I missed you so much!
translation.it: Bastone, amico! Mi sei mancato un sacco!

translation.en: The team is back.
I guess this is goodbye.
Wait, don't go yet. [grunts]
Thank you for everything.
I'll miss you, Monkey.
Keep writing your scroll, Lin.
I will.
[Lin] I kept my promise and did great things.
translation.it: Ho onorato la promessa e fatto grandi cose.

translation.en: And Monkey, I'm sure he'll be out in no time.
translation.it: E Monkey, sono certa che uscirà molto presto.

translation.en: Monkey, demons run wild across the land.
translation.it: Monkey, i demoni dilagano nelle nostre terre.

translation.en: The Buddha sent us to release you.
translation.it: Il Buddha ci manda a liberarti.

translation.en: Are you ready to join our journey to the West?
translation.it: Sei pronto a viaggiare con noi verso ovest?

translation.en: I have awoken with peace in my heart,
translation.it: Mi sono risvegliato con la pace nel cuore

translation.en: and you wish for me to fight?
translation.it: e voi mi chiedete di combattere?

translation.en: Well, yes, but--
Come on, Stick. The world needs us.
translation.it: Forza, Bastone. Il mondo ha bisogno di noi.

translation.en: Huh? Oh no!
